fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 202.96 lakh crore compared with Rs 226.39 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 shed 18.45 points or 0.10% to settle at 17,895.70. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 0.48% to 15.44. Bharti Airtel, ICICI Bank and RIL were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The January 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 January 2023.
